unnormalised: problem विषयार, Heron's सूत्र वापरून त्रिकोणाचे क्षेत्रफळ काढणे, sqrt[s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)] जंय s=(a+b+c)/2 आनी बाजू a=3cm, b=4cm, c=5cm आसत, निमाणो निकाल 6 sq cm येवंक जाय. कृपया inputs आनी units परत एकदा तपासून पळयात.
normalised: Problem vixim, Heron's formula vaprun triangle-achem area kaddtlear, sachem square root gunile s minus a gunile s minus b gunile s minus c zata, zantun s mhunje a plus b plus c donan bhagilelem ani sides mhunje a tin centimeter, b char centimeter, c panch centimeter, haka lagun final result saha square centimeter yetalem. Inputs ani units barobar assat ki na te poriksha korun ghe.
